Summary: At approx. 11:09 p.m. EST, Feb 6, 2012, I sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain. The light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear.
divs: sighting detailsat approx. 11:09 p.m., est, february 6, 2012. i sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain. the light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear. this is the third such observation of lights in this area since feb. 2, 2012. sometimes they appear higher\lower in the sky but always display the same pattern of being stationary with constant light and slow descents. the placement of the sighted lights has been variable, i.e. sometimes visable at a higher point on the slope of the mountain.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Bedford
There was one other sighting in Bedford on or around February 6th 2012
